sections.heading: Short weight3-282.Short weightIf any fertilizer material in the possession of the consumer is found by the director to be short in weight, the licensee or distributor of the fertilizer material shall, within thirty days after official notice from the department, pay to the consumer a penalty equal t
sections.text: Short weight3-282.Short weightIf any fertilizer material in the possession of the consumer is found by the director to be short in weight, the licensee or distributor of the fertilizer material shall, within thirty days after official notice from the department, pay to the consumer a penalty equal to four times the value of the actual shortage.
